SELECT IF(RST.COMPLETE_YN = 'N', '예약중', NULL) RSV_STATE , VHC.VHC_ID , VHC.VHC_NO , DVC.DVC_KIND , DVC.MNG_ID , DATE_FORMAT(RSV.RSV_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') RSV_DT , RSV.RSV_ID , DVC.INST_LOC FROM BMS_VHC_MST VHC LEFT JOIN BMS_DVC_INFO DVC ON VHC.VHC_ID = DVC.VHC_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_DL_CD_INFO DL ON DVC.DVC_KIND = DL.DL_CD AND DL.CO_CD = 'DVC_KIND' LEFT JOIN BMS_ED_RSV_RST_INFO RST ON DVC.MNG_ID = RST.MNG_ID AND COMPLETE_YN = 'N' LEFT JOIN BMS_ED_RSV_INFO RSV ON RST.RSV_ID = RSV.RSV_ID WHERE VHC.USE_YN = 'Y' AND DVC.USE_YN = 'Y' AND DVC.DVC_KIND = 'DK004' AND DVC.MNG_ID IS NOT NULL
AND VHC.VHC_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
ORDER BY VHC.VHC_ID, DVC.MNG_ID

SELECT VHC.VHC_ID ,VHC.VHC_NO ,DVC.MNG_ID ,RST.PROCE_RST ,DATE_FORMAT(RST.SEND_DTM, '%Y%m%d') SEND_DTM ,ORG.ORG_NM ,DVC.DVC_KIND ,DVC.INST_LOC ,DATE_FORMAT(RSV.RSV_DT, '%Y%m%d') RSV_DT ,IF(RST.COMPLETE_YN = 'N', '예약중', '예약종료') RSV_STATE FROM BMS_VHC_MST VHC LEFT JOIN BMS_DVC_INFO DVC ON VHC.VHC_ID = DVC.VHC_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_ORG_MST ORG ON DVC.ORG_ID = ORG.ORG_ID AND ORG.ORG_DIV = 'OD008' LEFT JOIN BMS_DL_CD_INFO DL ON DVC.DVC_KIND = DL.DL_CD AND DL.CO_CD = 'DVC_KIND' LEFT JOIN BMS_ED_RSV_RST_INFO RST ON DVC.MNG_ID = RST.MNG_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_ED_RSV_INFO RSV ON RST.RSV_ID = RSV.RSV_ID WHERE VHC.VHC_ID = #{VHC_ID} AND DVC.DVC_KIND = 'DK004'
